clinical_history: Routine obstetric ultrasound for fetal growth.
findings: Gallbladder shows smooth-walled, no stones or wall thickening.
Left kidney shows smooth-walled, corticomedullary differentiation preserved.
Soft tissue region demonstrates ill-defined without fluid collection.
Right kidney demonstrates coarse, no hydronephrosis.
Common bile duct measures 10.61 mm, within normal limits.
Uterus appears mildly heterogeneous; endometrial thickness measures 20.82 mm.
Prostate is coarse; volume approximately 12.17 cc.
